thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com
thread.title: CHESNICK, ERIC

author: CHESNICK, ERIC
title: CHESNICK, ERIC
text: I like many people, I did months of research before pulling the trigger. My family is more than satisfied with the product. The machine has exceeded our expectations. Whole latte love offered a great product at a great price with free shipping. They even called to personally talk to me and give me tips on operation To make sure I would be completely happy. I would highly recommend everyone!!!
